imdb.plot outline: THRU is a brand new reality knock out game. In each episode two teams trek across daunting landscapes following a straight line from point A to point B. Each team starts at opposite ends and travels in opposite directions. They face difficult obstacles and physical challenges by trekking directly over, under, and through buildings, drop-offs, swamps and pools. The team that takes the shortest route will be the team that survives and thrives.
imdb.title: Thru
